descripcion: Set in a distant future, Dune follows the story of Paul Atreides as he navigates political intrigue, interplanetary conflicts, and the mystical powers of the desert planet Arrakis.
In a crumbling Galactic Empire, Hari Seldon uses his mathematical theory of psychohistory to predict the impending fall of civilization and establish the Foundation to preserve human knowledge.
Case, a washed-up computer hacker, is hired by a mysterious employer to carry out an impossible heist in the virtual world of cyberspace.
